mapper.select: select id, account, nickname, password, salt, dep_id, job_id, state, phone, email, birthday, identify, avatar, create_time from shop_mall.sys_user where id = #{id}
select id, account, nickname, password, salt, dep_id, job_id, state, phone, email, birthday, identify, avatar, create_time from shop_mall.sys_user limit #{offset}, #{limit}

select sp.id permission_id, sr.id role_id, sr.role, sp.permission, su.* from sys_user su inner join sys_user_role_relation surr on su.id = surr.user_id inner join sys_role sr on sr.id = surr.role_id inner join sys_role_permission_relation srpr on srpr.role_id = sr.id inner join sys_permission sp on sp.id = srpr.permission_id where su.account = #{account} group by sp.permission
mapper.insert: insert into shop_mall.sys_user(account, nickname, password, salt, dep_id, job_id, state, phone, email, birthday, identify, avatar, create_time) values (#{account}, #{nickname}, #{password}, #{salt}, #{depId}, #{jobId}, #{state}, #{phone}, #{email}, #{birthday}, #{identify}, #{avatar}, #{createTime})
mapper.update:
update shop_mall.sys_user
account = #{account},
nickname = #{nickname},
password = #{password},
salt = #{salt},
dep_id = #{depId},
job_id = #{jobId},
state = #{state},
phone = #{phone},
email = #{email},
birthday = #{birthday},
identify = #{identify},
avatar = #{avatar},
create_time = #{createTime},
where id = #{id}
mapper.select:
SELECT count(*) FROM ( SELECT count(*) FROM sys_user su LEFT JOIN sys_department sd ON sd.id = su.dep_id LEFT JOIN sys_job sj ON sj.id = su.job_id LEFT JOIN sys_user_role_relation surr ON surr.user_id = su.id LEFT JOIN sys_role sr ON sr.id = surr.role_id
sr.role = 'client' and su.id != 1
and su.nickname like CONCAT(#{nickname},'%')
and su.phone like CONCAT(#{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')
and su.state = #{state}
GROUP BY su.id ) a

select count(*) from ( select su.* from sys_user su left join sys_user_role_relation surr on surr.user_id = su.id left join sys_role sr on sr.id = surr.role_id
su.id != 1 and sr.role != 'client'
and su.nickname like CONCAT(#{nickname},'%')
